div.font:
Quality Control:
Quality filtering/trimming + length filtering + initial reports of sequencing success per library
Program: fastp

div.font:
Sequence assembly:
Non-cellular DNA reads will be assembled into contigs.
Program: metaviralSPAdes

div.font: Non-cellular RNA reads will be assembled into contigs.

div.font:
Dereplication:
Non-cellular DNA contigs will be dereplicated identifying unique sequences present in sample
Program: VSEARCH

sequences from
metagenomes (.fasta)

switch.text: Sequence quantification and comparisonReads will then be mapped...

Synthesized report on variations in virus diversity and gene transcription
across samples, species, time, and space.
